bibdata.title: IEEE Application Guide for Transient Recovery Voltage for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis
IEEE Application Guide for Transient Recovery Voltage for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Superseded by IEEE Std C37.011-2005 Abstract: Procedures and calculations necessary to apply the standard transient recovery voltage (TRV) ratings for ac high-voltage circuit breakers rated above 1000 V and on a symmetrical current basis are covered. The capability limits of these circuit interrupting devices are determined largely by the TRV. TRV ratings are compared with typical system TRV duties.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C37.011-2005 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.011-1994)
